channel.title: Does Fool's Deceive trick Princess' Flirt?
channel.description: I played a game today where a Princess said the Fool attacked, we thought it was a Possessor jump because the Fool died same night. But when game ended it turned out he was real Fool.

item.title: Does Fool's Deceive trick Princess' Flirt?
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
Yes.
Unless it was changed which I believe it didn’t happen.

Read full topic
item.source: Does Fool's Deceive trick Princess' Flirt?

item.title: Does Fool's Deceive trick Princess' Flirt?
item.dc:creator: Captain
item.description:
This is the second time i heard fool’s deceive or scorned’s frame showed them attacked for will-o-wisp.So it is prob true

item.title: Does Fool's Deceive trick Princess' Flirt?
